text: The Crammer () is a 1958 West German comedy film directed by Axel von Ambesser and starring Heinz Rühmann, Wera Frydtberg and Gert Fröbe.The A to Z of German Cinema. p. 304 The film's sets were designed by the art director Hans Berthel and Robert Stratil. It was shot at the Bavaria Studios in Munich. == Cast == * Heinz Rühmann as Dr. Hermann Seidel * Wera Frydtberg as Vera Bork * Gert Fröbe as Freddy Blei * Bruni Löbel as Frl. Selinski * Ernst Fritz Fürbringer as School inspector Wagner * Hans Leibelt as Headmaster Wiesbacher * Franz-Otto Krüger as Headmaster Gaspari * Klaus Löwitsch as Harry Engelmann * as Martin Rössler * Michael Verhoeven as Peter Wieland * Peter Vogel as Eduard Neureiter * as Axel * as Rudi Bär * Peter Kraus as Achim Bork == References == ==Bibliography== * Reimer, Robert C. & Reimer, Carol J. The A to Z of German Cinema. Scarecrow Press, 2010. == External links == * Category:1958 comedy films Category:West German films Category:Films about educators Category:Films set in schools Category:1958 films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Axel von Ambesser Category:Gloria Film films Category:Films shot at Bavaria Studios
title: The Crammer
